Hello Low End Talk Users, 

I hope you are in the best of health.

As close as we are coming towards our doors, we are looking for 4 users who can test our network and give us a thumps up. 

Giving away the current package:

512MB RAM
20GB HDD
500GB Bandwidth
1 IP

We will stay in close touch to see how the performance is running and what we can do to improve. If you are interested (only 4 users first comment) i will be contacting.
